name: StealthyTheDisembodiedHousemate
0:
”Alexa, open stealthy the ghost”
”Start a toothbrush countdown”
”Listen to sleep sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stealthy the ghost
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill enables members of the Brackett family to interact with their favorite ghost to accomplish household activities by voice command. Access to this skill requires account linking and, as such, is available only to family members.
